executablePath.description: Enter the path to your phpstan executable.

autoExecutableSearch.title: Search for executables
autoExecutableSearch.description: Automatically search for `vendor/bin/phpstan` executable. Overrides the executable defined above.

autoAutoloadSearch.description: Automatically search for a `vendor/autoload.php` file to use as autoload. Overrides custom config defined above.

overrideConfigLevel.title: Override Level
overrideConfigLevel.description: When enabled this setting will override the level provided in the config.

enableDebugMode.description: Enable the debug mode for this linter package.

readme:
atom-linter-phpstan
=========================

This linter plugin for [Linter](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter) provides
an interface to [PHPStan](https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan). It will be
used with files that have the "PHP" syntax or PHP embedded within HTML.

## Installation
### PHPStan installation
Before installing this plugin, you must ensure that `phpstan` is installed on your
system. For detailed instructions see [PHPStan Github](https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan),
the simplified steps are:

0. Install [php](http://php.net).
0. Install [Composer](https://getcomposer.org/download/).
0. Install `phpstan` by typing the following in a terminal:
```ShellSession
composer global require phpstan/phpstan
```

After verifying that `phpstan` works from your terminal, proceed to install the atom-linter-phpstan plugin.

### Plugin installation
```ShellSession
$ apm install atom-linter-phpstan
```
